about.title: About Us
about.experienceTitle: We Are With You With 15 Years of Experience
about.p1: As Cyprus Language School, we have been providing quality language education to thousands of students since 2009. We ensure that our students get the best results in their language learning journey with our expert staff and modern educational methods.
about.p2: We contribute to our students' success in their academic and professional lives with the education we provide in English, Russian and Turkish. We make a difference with our modern facilities and interactive teaching methods.
about.missionDesc: To ensure our students are successful in their academic and professional lives by providing them with the highest quality language education.
about.visionDesc: To be the most preferred language school in Cyprus providing education at international standards.
about.valuesDesc: Continuous development with quality, trust, innovation and student-oriented approach.
